originalText.text: My daughter has been in Goddard since April and we have had a really good experience. The all staff is extremely kind and attentive. Ms. Mona, Ms. Jillian, Ms. Sofia are there every day to welcome and say goodbye and ready to respond to any questions or needs in the sweetest way. In the classroom we had Ms. Jada who was key to ensure my daughter's transition to a new school, but also to a new language and country, as we moved from abroad. Now we are with Ms. Candace and Ms. Ilene and they were fantastic, making the transition to a new classroom as smooth as possible. She is received every day with a smile and open arms. It is reassuring as a parent to see her walking smiling to her classroom and teachers and developing her playing and learning skills every day. It is a very familiar environment and I also feel that the parents and the school make it a great community.

originalText.text:
I have been a parent at Goddard Daycare in StuyTown for over a year now, and I cannot express how grateful I am for this childcare facility. Their staff, goes above and beyond to ensure a nurturing and educational environment for our little ones.

First and foremost, I would like to mention some of the amazing teachers who have played a significant role in making our experience at Goddard Daycare so positive.

Mr. Jose- is a treasure and this school should do everything in their power to keep him because he has MADE our son’s entire experience at this daycare so special. He has a natural talent for connecting with the children and creating engaging activities that promote learning and creativity

Miss Juliette- has such a warm demeanor with all the kids and they love her and feel happy in her presence

Miss Mona - her greetings are the kind that immediately turn you into a morning person and the children have always loved her (and I have too!)

Miss Jillian - My son runs to the office to say goodbye to Jillian on a daily basis, we cannot leave until he does so.

Mr. Cheikh - His ability to anticipate any child’s needs is remarkable. I will also say he is particularly amazing at redirecting the kids as different moods and emotions arise.

Miss Diana- My son just thinks she is so cool and for me she is just a solid teacher that engages well with all kids

Miss Sofie is new to me but she is very good at communicating with parents and sharing little snippets of the kid’s days at pick up, which I LOVE!

Miss Aileen- has had both of my children in her classes and I am very thankful to her positivity and resilience with the little ones!

An honorable mention to Miss Victoria and Miss Mia in the Shark room where our son gets to visit from time to time and often wants to stay in.

The daycare itself is well-maintained, clean, and exceptionally organized. The classrooms are bright and inviting, providing a stimulating environment for children to learn and grow. We’ve been happy with our experience here.

originalText.text: …how grateful I am that Ms. Aileen and Ms. Candace are my child’s teachers. Similarly to how I felt about the dynamic and lucky pairing of Ms. Carmen and Ms. Kayla, I feel about Candace and Aileen. I’m impressed by their professionalism, commitment, and genuine care. Everyday I witness their investment in their work and I am struck by the genuine affection they show my child. (My child loves Candace and Aileen so much and talks about them all weekend!) Ms. Aileen has been such a warm relationship for my child (similar to her love for the phenomenally kind and gracious Ms. Kayla). I am grateful for the extra steps Candace and Aileen take to connect with me upon drop off, for their intuitive understanding about what is useful for me to know, and for their obvious affection for the children. I appreciate their steadiness and professionalism. Having my child at Goddard has been such a joy. I am very appreciative to all the staff in general and for their kindness and attention. Special thanks to Jillian and Mona and the admin team. Goddard is a great place.

originalText.text: My LO has been at Goddard since April 2022 and we absolutely know we made the right choice of childcare.  The teachers are warm and supportive of the children’s growth and well-being.  Our LO has absolutely adored their teachers and is thrilled to go to school each day.  The children get to enjoy a variety of activities both indoors and outside.  My child has absolutely thrived during her time at Goddard StuyTown!

originalText.text: We are so grateful for our incredible teachers Ms Sandy and Ms Lyne! Every day we receive numerous pictures of our 5 month old engaging in fun, developmentally appropriate activities in a nurturing environment. When we drop him off and pick him up he is always so joyful, you can tell he loves to be there! Communication with the school has been great (we appreciate the monthly newsletter!) and we love all the fun themed days and parent engagement. Thank you Goddard for taking such thoughtful care of our little guy!
